verses.verse: And the lot<WH1486> came<WH3318> out for the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> from the Jordan<WH3383> at Jericho<WH3405>, at the waters<WH4325> of Jericho<WH3405> on the east<WH4217>, even the wilderness<WH4057>, going up<WH5927> from Jericho<WH3405> through the hill-country<WH2022> to Beth-el<WH1008>;
and it went out<WH3318> from Beth-el<WH1008> to Luz<WH3870>, and passed along<WH5674> unto the border<WH1366> of the Archites<WH757> to Ataroth<WH5852>;

and it went down<WH3381> westward<WH3220> to the border<WH1366> of the Japhletites<WH3311>, unto the border<WH1366> of Beth-horon<WH1032> the nether<WH8481>, even unto Gezer<WH1507>; and the goings out<WH8444> thereof were at the sea<WH3220>.
And the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130>, Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim<WH669>, took their inheritance<WH5157>.

And the border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> according to their families<WH4940> was thus<WH1366>: the border of their inheritance<WH5159> eastward<WH4217> was Ataroth-addar<WH5853>, unto Beth-horon<WH1032> the upper<WH5945>;

and the border<WH1366> went out<WH3318> westward<WH3220> at Michmethath<WH4366> on the north<WH6828>; and the border<WH1366> turned about<WH5437> eastward<WH4217> unto Taanath-shiloh<WH8387>, and passed<WH5674> along it on the east<WH4217> of Janoah<WH3239>;
and it went down<WH3381> from Janoah<WH3239> to Ataroth<WH5852>, and to Naarah<WH5292>, and reached<WH6293> unto Jericho<WH3405>, and went out<WH3318> at the Jordan<WH3383>.

From Tappuah<WH8599> the border<WH1366> went along westward<WH3220> to the brook<WH5158> of Kanah<WH7071>; and the goings out<WH8444> thereof were at the sea<WH3220>. This is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> according to their families<WH4940>;

together with the cities<WH5892> which were set apart<WH3995> for the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> in the midst<WH8432> of the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519>, all the cities<WH5892> with their villages<WH2691>.

And they drove not out<WH3423> the Canaanites<WH3669> that dwelt<WH3427> in Gezer<WH1507>: but the Canaanites<WH3669> dwell<WH3427> in the midst<WH7130> of Ephraim<WH669> unto this day<WH3117>, and are become servants<WH5647> to do taskwork<WH4522>.
